column5: Hey guy well it's my b-day today and I have been lookin for a job was a fishing guide and I just got a call today to work at hawk lake lodge as a guide WoW what a present so I'm off this weekend to work
Congrats...bring a really good rainsuit, bugspray and 2X more booze than you think you'll need.
Tell daryll from tillsonburg Shawn says Hi LOL I was just told about that job yesterday it sounds like a awesome place have fun and don't "work" to hard LOL.
The most important part right there! LOL  Congrats on snagging a day job!
Thaxz alot guys  i can't wait

Well, Happy Birthday and good luck with the new job too.  A little piece of advise to send off to the owner if you could. Please tell him to update his web site as his recent monthly report was from July of 2009. Another pointer you could tell him is perhaps a map or directions on how to get there. The only way I could tell he was in Kenora was through his mailing address. Ironically, on the contact me page he even left out Kenora in the mailing address. Then there is that dreaded payments in USD funds. Man I hate that, he is in Canada!  Other than that, enjoy your Summer!
